summary: Iteration 7: Complete SEO infrastructure testing. All backend SEO endpoints working correctly (sitemap.xml, robots.txt, seo-data/{slug}). Frontend SEO implementation verified: Homepage has FAQ & WebSite JSON-LD; Article pages have Article & BreadcrumbList JSON-LD with og:type=article; Bonus guide page has CollectionPage JSON-LD; Sports news page has CollectionPage JSON-LD; Login page has noindex meta tag. All meta tags (title, description, og:*, twitter:*, canonical) are properly injected via SEOHead component.

minor.issue: Not accessible via public URL (Kubernetes ingress routes non-/api paths to frontend). Not a bug - expected infrastructure behavior.

issues: Age verification popup shows on every visit - consider localStorage persistence (same as previous iterations)
Welcome/bonus popup overlays content on initial load - may impact user experience

critical_code_review_comments: SEOHead.jsx correctly uses native DOM manipulation (document.createElement) instead of react-helmet-async
JSON-LD scripts are properly injected via useEffect with cleanup on unmount
All pages have proper canonical URLs
Article pages correctly set og:type=article with article:published_time
Login page correctly has noindex, nofollow meta
Sitemap.xml contains static pages, categories, and articles with proper lastmod dates
Robots.txt correctly disallows /admin, /admin-login, and /api/ while allowing /api/sitemap.xml for Googlebot

success_rate.backend: 89% (16/18 tests passed - 2 health endpoint failures are infrastructure-related, not bugs)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 7 verified SEO infrastructure: sitemap.xml, robots.txt, JSON-LD structured data (FAQPage, WebSite, Article, BreadcrumbList, CollectionPage), canonical URLs, Open Graph tags, Twitter Cards, and noindex for admin pages. All SEO features working correctly.

seo_data.returns: Article metadata including title, description, published_time, schema_type
